entities.description: Displayed for the variables are not weighted and are purely descriptive.
May not be available for every variable, though they include minimum, maximum, arithmetic mean, median, mode, and standard deviation.
The target group of individuals for whom the dataset is intended.
Contains the variable description and frequencies.
Elements that are present and provide sufficient information about each variable in the dataset.
The producing archive making intentional decisions about the dataset content.

relationships.description: Provides descriptions and frequencies of the variables.
Showcase of statistical summaries when available.
Encompasses types like minimum, maximum, arithmetic mean, median, mode, and standard deviation.
Indicates the intentional decisions by the producing archive regarding dataset content.
The intended group for whom the dataset data is collected and analyzed.
